Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Augusta
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Augusta, Central, Division, and Austin due to, street blockage at Austin/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Augusta, Central, Division, and Austin due to, street blockage at Austin/Augusta.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Soutbound Reroute near Austin/Thomas
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Central, Augusta and Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Austin/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Central, Augusta and Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Austin/Thomas.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
